mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM products p JOIN subscribes s ON p.no = s.product_no WHERE p.giver_no =#{giverNo} AND s.status ='Y' AND cancel_date is null

SELECT count(*) FROM products p JOIN subscribes s ON p.no = s.product_no WHERE p.giver_no = #{giverNo} AND s.status ='Y' AND cancel_date is null AND TO_CHAR(s.regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = TO_CHAR(current_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')
SELECT count(*) FROM products WHERE type= 'N' and giver_no = #{giverNo}
SELECT to_char(s.regdate,'yyyymmdd') "DATE", count(*) total FROM products p JOIN subscribes s ON p.no = s.product_no where p.giver_no=#{giverNo} group by to_char(s.regdate,'yyyymmdd')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM subscribes s, products p WHERE s.taker_no=#{takerNo} AND s.product_no=p.no ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT no,productNo,status,price,addr,addrDetail,startDate,takerNo,photo,productName,deliveryStart FROM(SELECT no,productNo,status,price,addr,addrDetail,startDate,takerNo,photo,productName, rownum r,deliveryStart FROM(SELECT s.no,s.product_no productNo,s.status,s.price,s.addr,s.addr_detail addrDetail,s.regdate startDate ,s.taker_no takerNo,p.photo photo,p.name productName, s.delivery_start deliveryStart FROM subscribes s, products p WHERE s.taker_no=#{takerNo} AND s.product_no=p.no ORDER BY 1 DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
AND status='Y'
select s.delivery_start as "start", p.name as "title" from subscribes s, products p where s.taker_no = #{takerNo} and s.cancel_date is null and s.product_no = p.no
select s.delivery_start as "start", p.name as "title", p.no as "productNo" from subscribes s, products p where s.taker_no = #{takerNo} and s.cancel_date is null and s.product_no = p.no
SELECT to_char(s.regdate,'yyyymm') "MONTH", count(*) total FROM products p JOIN subscribes s ON p.no = s.product_no where p.giver_no=#{giverNo} group by to_char(s.regdate,'yyyymm')
